key_risks: Technological and commercialization risks due to early-stage solid-state battery technology
Financial instability with negative gross profit margins and reliance on investor funding
Supply chain vulnerabilities and regulatory compliance risks
Market and competitive pressures from established battery manufacturers and declining EV demand
controversies: Potential delays in commercialization and meeting performance targets
Safety incidents during testing or deployment could harm reputation
environmental_issues: Vulnerability to disruptions in the supply of critical materials like lithium and nickel
Advancing cobalt- and nickel-free battery research to align with sustainability goals
social_issues: Potential impact on workforce and communities due to financial instability and scaling challenges
governance_issues: Insiders owning only 22.50% of shares, with financial institutions holding 24.08%
Compliance with global safety and environmental regulations
